name: 2021 INSTITUTIONAL BLOCKCHAIN INVESTMENT GUIDE
description: Over the last two years, as we analyse blockchain projects looking for those more likely to succeed, we’ve found common trends among those succeeding and those failing to make an impact. This has led us to develop a proprietary methodology and become professionals in Institutional Grade Project Examination of blockchain projects, crowdfunding rounds, and their inner workings. We’ve put together the 2021 Institutional Blockchain Investment Guide to help you research, understand, and spot the “X” factor behind what drives success in the blockchain industry. With this guide, we hope to help institutions worldwide drive the necessary capital towards projects that can disrupt industries and change lives. You'll be able to download this guide at https://d-core.net/2021-institutional-investment-blockchain-guide/.
